title: Mnason
html: MNASON(Mnaʹson).A native of Cyprus and “an early disciple.” Paul and those with him were to be entertained in Mnason’s home when the apostle was completing a missionary journey about 56 C.E. Some disciples from Caesarea accompanied Paul’s group on the way from Caesarea to Jerusalem, to bring them to Mnason.—Ac 21:15-17.
